channel.title: Comments on: DIIOP to Domino from JBoss

item.title: By: Jas
item.dc:creator: Jas
item.description: <p>We have a similar set up in our environment but we connect to server A and then connect to server B to get the database. This was we only have one machine serving DIIOP requests.</p>
item.content:encoded: We have a similar set up in our environment but we connect to server A and then connect to server B to get the database. This was we only have one machine serving DIIOP requests.

item.title: By: Mikkel Heisterberg
item.dc:creator: Mikkel Heisterberg
item.description: <p>I can confirm that is as much that is what I have experienced myself. You are unable to "relay" to pass-through to another server <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GHL/$File/sad.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded: I can confirm that is as much that is what I have experienced myself. You are unable to “relay” to pass-through to another server http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GHL/$File/sad.gif“ />
